Trust in the Guide Star.name: Trust in the Guide Star
Trust in the Guide Star.flavor: You squeeze tight your eyes and call upon the Purple Star to grasp your mind and guide your strike.
Trust in the Guide Star.special: You ignore penalties for cover (but not superior cover), concealment, and total concealment. You can attack an invisible target as if it were not invisible.

Steps on the Purple Stair.name: Steps on the Purple Stair
Steps on the Purple Stair.flavor: At Caiphon’s bidding, you take a half step into a temporary echo plane where wind shrieks like the screams of tortured lunatics and where indescribable colors squirm across your skin. Something shudders on the horizon, but you step fully back into the world before its identity resolves.
Steps on the Purple Stair.effect: You gain invisibility and a fly speed equal to your speed until the start of your next turn. On your next turn you take ongoing 3 psychic damage (save ends).

Caiphon's Hungry Mercy.name: Caiphon's Hungry Mercy
Caiphon's Hungry Mercy.flavor: Your guide star offers all who heed your sudden rant to “Trust in Caiphon!” a boon of renewed power. Your lord requires only a sip of life from each ally who partakes. So little in return for so much!
Caiphon's Hungry Mercy.target: You and all allies in the burst
Caiphon's Hungry Mercy.effect: You and each ally in the burst can spend a healing surge to recover a power. Each of you choosing to do so rolls a d6. On a roll of 1–5, the power recovered is an encounter power. On a roll of 6, the power recovered is a daily power.
